    Takes the player and checks the team size (max is 4), promting the user to select one to remove one if there are to many.

    Command line interface to choose to sell an item, monster or return back to the shop.

    ShopCommandLine.sellItem(Player pla, Shop shop)
    Command line interface for selling an item to the shop, the player's items are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose an item to sell.
    private void
    ShopCommandLine.sellMonster(Player pla, Shop shop)
    Command line interface for selling a monster to the shop, the player's monster's are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose a monster to sell.
    private boolean
    InventoryCommandLine.useItem(Item item, Player pla)
    Displays the monsters in the player's team that an item may be used on and prompts the user to either return to the prievious menu or use the item on one of those monsters.
